Header: Indian Defence Secretary Visits Sacred Temple of Tooth Relic
Content: Indian Defence Secretary Mr Sanjay Mitra and 15 other delegates currently in Sri Lanka on a two-day official visit to attend bilateral discussions in the 6th round of ‘India-Sri Lanka Annual Defence Dialogue’ venerated the sacred Temple of Tooth Relics in Kandy this morning (9). On arrival at the sacred Temple of Tooth Relics in Kandy, Major General T.J Nanayakkara, General Officer Commanding 11 Division warmly welcomed the delegation and facilitated their visit. Mementos were also exchanged as symbols of goodwill.
